messages.title: After 13 years of Gordon Brown and Labour...
messages.content: Massive cuts to our health services, worst recession for 70 years, violent crime has doubled under Labour, thousands killed in illegal Iraq war.

messages.title: It's time for REAL change
messages.content: Bridget Fox will be a hard-working local MP for our area. Bridget will always put local people first, not party politics.

messages.title: Enough is enough - it's time for change
messages.content: Alistair Darling: "we [Labour] will cut deeper than Margaret Thatcher" - Guardian, March 26th 2010

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race. Lib Dem 11,861, Lab just 484 votes and Gordon Brown's Labour MP. The Conservatives can't win here. Source: General Election result in Islington South & Finsbury 2005.

issues.health: Massive cuts to our health services

quotes.text: we [Labour] will cut deeper than Margaret Thatcher

images.caption: After 13 years of Gordon Brown and Labour... just look at the mess we're in
